Frequently when exiting my application invoked through -application (selfhosted
only, never seen it when actually running it for real), I get the following
error thrown. Somewhat elusive (timing?)...I can't get it thrown when starting
it as Debug...my guess is only that there is a Job somewhere that should be told
to stop or something like that...???

	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.utils.StringPoolJob.shareStrings(StringPoolJob.java:111)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.utils.StringPoolJob.run(StringPoolJob.java:93)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:76)
